name: The Dark Truth Of P.S. 38 Part 5
name_original: The Dark Truth Of P.S. 38 Part 5
description:
The Dark Truth Of P.S. 38 Part 5 is a game developed by multiplegamesman. It was originally released in 2021.
The Dark Truth Of P.S. 38 Part 5 is available on PC, macOS, Linux and Android. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
